title: Senior Wordpress Backend Developer
job_overview:
Non negotiable skills required:
- Previous experience building a WordPress Plugin from scratch
- Knowledge of how to make custom Database tables in WordPress
- PHP Mastery (5 years+)
- Understanding of WordPress's REST API and how and when to integrate it into a plugin.

Preferred skills:
- JS Mastery
- VCS Mastery (You should know your way around git)
- LMS/LearnDash expertise
- WooCommerce expertise
- Understanding of the broader WordPress ecosystem such as (ACF, WP Fusion, Block Builders, Form Builders etc).
- React Knowledge
- Knowledge in registering and creating blocks.
